resource.chars:
<u>Plate <\u> III
Upper view of cranium.
Letters as in preceding plates.
<u>Plate IV. Left femur, back view (articular end restored).
a. Trochanter minor.
b. Process for iliacus internus.
b’. Inner origin of ‘linea aspera ‘.
c. Trochanter tertius.
c’. Ridge continued down for the Gluteus maximus./
d. ‘Outer lip ‘ of ‘linea aspera’, for vastus externus, for vastus internus.
e. ‘Inner lip ‘ of ‘linea aspera ‘.
f. Ridge for ‘Short head of biceps flexor crucis ‘
(continuation of ‘outer lip ‘ of ‘linea aspera ).
All the figures are of the natural size.
